w4160.engine.graphics

Class ShaderProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • w4160.engine.graphics.ShaderProgram

  • public class ShaderProgram
extends java.lang.Object
    This class reads, compiles, and links vertex and/or fragment shader. It will be used when Renderer renders meshes.
